Interface SuspensePayment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, EventAware, com.guidewire.pl.domain.messaging.gen.EventAwareStubI, IGosuObject, InCurrencySilo, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.InCurrencySiloStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, PaymentReceipt, com.guidewire.bc.domain.payment.gen.PaymentReceiptStubI, Retireable, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, com.guidewire.bc.domain.payment.gen.SuspensePaymentStubI, TAccountOwner, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.TAccountOwnerStubI, Validatable, com.guidewire.pl.domain.validation.gen.ValidatableStubI, Versionable

    public interface SuspensePayment
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.payment.gen.SuspensePaymentStubI
    SuspensePayment A payment made against an account or policy that does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • createSuspensePayment

        void createSuspensePayment()
        Initialize the amount of the suspense payment. Sets up the TAccounts

      • getDisbursementAppliedTo

        Disbursement getDisbursementAppliedTo()
        Returns:
        the most recent disbursement that has been applied to this account if it has not been rejected.

      • getDisplayTransaction

        Transaction getDisplayTransaction()
        Return the transaction that will be displayed in the UI as being the one associated with this Suspense Payment.

        Which transaction this method returns depends on the current state of this Suspense Payment: Applied to Policy or Account: returns the AccountPaid transaction for the account that was paid Otherwise, returns the most recent Transaction.

        Returns:
        transaction that will be displayed in the UI for this Suspense Payment

      • getCreationTransaction

        Transaction getCreationTransaction()
        Returns:
        the transaction associated with the initial creation of the Suspense Payment

      • getApplyEntity

        java.lang.String getApplyEntity()
        Returns:
        a string version describing the enity that the Suspense Payment was or should be applied to.

      • applyTo

        PaymentMoneyReceived applyTo(Producer producer)
        Creates a agency money received from the suspense payment and applies it to the producer unapplied.
        Parameters:
        producer - the producer to apply the payment to
        Returns:
        the money received

      • applyTo

        DirectBillMoneyRcvd applyTo(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Creates a payment from the suspense payment and applies it to the Policy Period
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - a PolicyPeriod
        Returns:
        the money received

      • applyTo

        DirectBillMoneyRcvd applyTo(Account payerAccount,
                          PolicyPeriod targetPolicyPeriod)
        Applies the SuspensePayment to the passed-in PolicyPeriod. The paying Account of the resulting DirectBillMoneyRcvd will be the passed-in Account rather than the Account from the passed-in PolicyPeriod.
        Parameters:
        payerAccount - will become the paying Account of the returned DirectBillMoneyRcvd
        targetPolicyPeriod - the PolicyPeriod to which the SuspensePayment will be applied
        Returns:
        the money received

      • applyTo

        DirectBillMoneyRcvd applyTo(Account account)
        Creates a payment from the suspense payment and applies it to the account
        Parameters:
        account - an Account
        Returns:
        the money received

      • updateAmount

        void updateAmount(MonetaryAmount newAmount)
        Update the amount on a given suspense payment
        Parameters:
        newAmount - MonetaryAmount
